questions.question: "If Winter comes, can Spring be far behind?" is an expression of -
"Life is a roller coaster with its ups and downs" is an example of -

options.label: ‡¶ï
options.text: He says that he can go for a walk.

options.label: ‡¶ò

questions.option_d: He says that he should go for a walk.
